name: ufront-orm
description: An extension of Haxe's sys.db classes that provide relationships (foreign keys), validation, permission checking and client-side safety.
releasenote: Much improved validation/error handling. ManyToMany bug fixes and improvements. Better error handling on build macros. Workaround for sys.db.Manager until Haxe PR 2692 is merged. Only @:keep on the server.
